channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Job Portal -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Job Portal -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28534|2024-08-02T13:43:22.941Z -- wp%20job%20portal -- wp%20job%20portal%20%E2%80%93%20a%20complete%20job%20board
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WP Job Portal WP Job Portal – A Complete Job Board plugin <= 2.0.0 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-35759|2024-06-21T14:00:51.786Z -- wp%20job%20portal -- wp%20job%20portal
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Job Portal allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Job Portal: from n/a through 2.1.3.
